name: Library Climbing Shoes
description: Library Climbing Shoes - the perfect solution for spelunkers. Made from high-quality materials, they provide excellent grip and comfort during climbing. Suitable for both beginners and advanced cave explorers. Upper Material: Synthetic leather, Sole: Rubber, Closure System: Lacing, Weight: 500 g. Available sizes: 39, 40, 41, 42, 43, 44.

name: Northwind Climbing Shoes
description: Northwind Climbing Shoes - innovative spelunking shoes providing excellent grip on any surface. Comfortable and lightweight, perfect for challenging underground conditions. Upper Material: Mesh and synthetic leather, Sole: Vibram, Closure System: Stretchable elastic bands, Weight: 450 g. Available sizes: 38, 39, 40, 41, 42.

name: Loanhist Climbing Shoes
description: Loanhist Climbing Shoes - excellent shoes for spelunkers seeking durable footwear. Resilient to cave conditions, providing maximum protection and comfort during exploration. Upper Material: Natural leather, Sole: Vibram Mega-Grip, Closure System: Strong velcro closure, Weight: 550 g. Available sizes: 40, 41, 42, 43, 44, 45.

name: Juvenile Climbing Shoes
description: Juvenile Climbing Shoes - ensuring maximum comfort and safety for young cave explorers. Sturdy construction and attractive design for the youngest spelunking enthusiasts. Upper Material: Synthetic textile material, Sole: Rubber, Closure System: Elastic laces, Weight: 400 g. Available sizes: 28, 29, 30, 31, 32, 33.

name: Northwind REGULAR Speleological Helmet
description: Northwind REGULAR Speleological Helmet - solid protection for every spelunker. Durable construction and adjustable strap system ensure safety in challenging underground conditions. Material: Polycarbonate, Size Adjustment: Rear adjustment system, Padding: Soft foam, Weight: 550 g. Available size: Universal.

name: Northwind LIMITED Speleological Helmet
description: Northwind LIMITED Speleological Helmet - exclusive protection for demanding spelunkers. Limited edition with additional features, providing maximum comfort and safety. Material: Fiberglass, Size Adjustment: Rear adjustment system, Padding: Comfortable foam padding, Weight: 500 g. Available size: Universal.

name: Library Speleological Helmet
description: Library Speleological Helmet - classic protection for cave enthusiasts. Solid construction and adjustable strap ensure safety during exploration of underground labyrinths. Material: Polypropylene, Size Adjustment: Adjustable strap, Padding: Soft inlay, Weight: 480 g. Available size: Universal.

name: Professional Harness by DBManage
description: Professional Harness by DBManage - robust speleological harness ensuring maximum safety during cave exploration. Sturdy construction and adjustable fastening system for a perfect fit. Weight: 700 g. Available sizes: S, M, L.

name: Idaho Rope Set
description: Idaho Rope Set - complete set of speleological ropes ideal for various applications. Durable and sturdy ropes for safe movement in challenging underground conditions. Length of each rope: 30 m. Rope diameter: 9 mm.

name: Alabama Rope Set
description: Alabama Rope Set - high-quality set of speleological ropes created for demanding explorers. Excellent operational properties and durability. Length of each rope: 40 m. Rope diameter: 10 mm.
